time

Class Time

  • java.lang.Object
    • time.Time
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Time>, java.util.Comparator<Time>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    PioneerTime

    public class Time
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Time>, java.util.Comparator<Time>
    Class - Time

    Object used to hold the current client.time of day or set a specific client.time of day to hold

    Author:
    Brandon Bonebrake, Bryce Bierman
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
